officialTitle: Pericoital Oral Contraception With Levonorgestrel: A Prospective, Open-Label, Single Arm, Multicenter Study to Evaluate Efficacy, Safety and Acceptability
summary: A prospective, open-label, single arm, multicenter study to evaluate efficacy, safety and acceptability of pericoital oral contraception with levonorgestrel

primaryOutcome.measure: Efficacy: the Pearl Index (Number of Pregnancies Per 100 Woman-years) in the Primary Evaluable Population (18-35)
